mapper.sql: uuid, `date`, app_no, fun_no, code, `status`, content, `sum`, money, create_time
mapper.insert:
insert into data
`date`,
app_no,
fun_no,
code,
`status`,
content,
`sum`,
money,
create_time,
#{date,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{appNo,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{funNo,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{code,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{sum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{money,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
#{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
mapper.update:
update data
`date` = #{date,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
app_no = #{appNo,jdbcType=INTEGER},
fun_no = #{funNo,jdbcType=INTEGER},
code = #{code,jdbcType=INTEGER},
`status` = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
content = #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
`sum` = #{sum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
money = #{money,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where uuid = #{uuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update data set `date` = #{date,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, app_no = #{appNo,jdbcType=INTEGER}, fun_no = #{funNo,jdbcType=INTEGER}, code = #{code,jdbcType=INTEGER}, `status` = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, content = #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `sum` = #{sum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, money = #{money,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where uuid = #{uuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: SELECT a.uuid, a.`date`, a.app_no, a.fun_no, a.code, a.`status`, a.content, a.`sum`, a.money, a.create_time FROM `data` a RIGHT JOIN ( SELECT MAX(b.create_time) btime FROM `data` b GROUP BY b.fun_no ) c ON a.create_time = c.btime WHERE a.`status` > 0 GROUP BY a.uuid ORDER BY a.create_time DESC, a.app_no, a.fun_no
